languages.text: "Я един с кораблем благодаря имплантам. И вот кажется мне, что с некоторых пор корабль себя вести стал иначе. Отзывается лучше. Летает живее. Да, "живее" хорошее слово... И почему-то когда вы сказали "Эпитафия" и "Инцидент" — я сразу об этом подумал. Извините за сумбур — больше ничего не имею сказать про это".

"Through my implants, I feel at one with this ship. And I sense that — and I don't know when it happened exactly — it started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."
languages.original_text: "Я един с кораблем благодаря имплантам. И вот кажется мне, что с некоторых пор корабль себя вести стал иначе. Отзывается лучше. Летает живее. Да, "живее" хорошее слово... И почему-то когда вы сказали "Эпитафия" и "Инцидент" — я сразу об этом подумал. Извините за сумбур — больше ничего не имею сказать про это".

traits.locale_text: "This ship and I are one. Because of my implants. And I feel like — and I don't know at what point it happened exactly — but she started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is right... And I don't know why, but when you said 'Epitaph' and 'Incident,' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

"This ship and I are one. Because of my implants. And I feel like — and I don't know at what point it happened exactly — but she started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is right... And I don't know why, but when you said 'Epitaph' and 'Incident,' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

"Through my implants, I feel at one with this ship. And I sense that — and I don't know when it happened exactly — it started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

"Through my implants, I feel at one with this ship. And I sense that — and I don't know when it happened exactly — it started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

"Through my implants, I feel at one with this ship. And I sense that — and I don't know when it happened exactly — it started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

languages.text: "Durch meine Implantate fühle ich mich eins mit diesem Schiff. Und ich spüre, dass es sein Verhalten geändert hat – weiß aber nicht genau, wann. Es wurde reaktiver. Lebendiger. Ja, 'lebendiger' ist genau das richtige Wort ... Und als Ihr 'Epitaph' und 'Vorfall' sagtet, dämmerte es mir. Verzeiht die stümperhafte Meldung, Lord Cap'n, aber das ist alles, was ich darüber zu sagen habe."
languages.original_text: "Through my implants, I feel at one with this ship. And I sense that — and I don't know when it happened exactly — it started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

traits.locale_text: "Durch meine Implantate fühle ich mich eins mit diesem Schiff. Und ich spüre, dass es sein Verhalten geändert hat – weiß aber nicht genau, wann. Es wurde reaktiver. Lebendiger. Ja, 'lebendiger' ist genau das richtige Wort ... Und als Ihr 'Epitaph' und 'Vorfall' sagtet, dämmerte es mir. Verzeiht die stümperhafte Meldung, Lord Cap'n, aber das ist alles, was ich darüber zu sagen habe."

languages.text: « Grâce à mes implants, je me sens en harmonie avec ce vaisseau et j'ai l'impression que... Je ne sais pas depuis quand exactement, mais que son comportement a changé. Qu'il répond plus vite. Qu'il est plus vivant. Oui, plus vivant, c'est exactement ça... En vous entendant dire "épitaphe" et "incident", c'est là que je m'en suis vraiment rendu compte. Excusez cette réponse médiocre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais c'est tout ce que je vois à vous dire sur la question. »
languages.original_text: "Through my implants, I feel at one with this ship. And I sense that — and I don't know when it happened exactly — it started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

traits.locale_text: « Grâce à mes implants, je me sens en harmonie avec ce vaisseau et j'ai l'impression que... Je ne sais pas depuis quand exactement, mais que son comportement a changé. Qu'il répond plus vite. Qu'il est plus vivant. Oui, plus vivant, c'est exactement ça... En vous entendant dire "épitaphe" et "incident", c'est là que je m'en suis vraiment rendu compte. Excusez cette réponse médiocre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais c'est tout ce que je vois à vous dire sur la question. »

languages.text: “我的植入物让我可以和这艘飞船融为一体。我感觉到了，不知道从什么时候开始，这艘船的行为变得有点不太一样了。它变得更灵敏，更……活泼，没错，就是‘活泼’这个词……你刚刚说‘碑碣’和‘事故’的时候，我才突然意识到这件事情。请原谅，我没想起什么有用的东西，但我恐怕只能想起这些了，船长老大。”
languages.original_text: "Through my implants, I feel at one with this ship. And I sense that — and I don't know when it happened exactly — it started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

traits.locale_text: “我的植入物让我可以和这艘飞船融为一体。我感觉到了，不知道从什么时候开始，这艘船的行为变得有点不太一样了。它变得更灵敏，更……活泼，没错，就是‘活泼’这个词……你刚刚说‘碑碣’和‘事故’的时候，我才突然意识到这件事情。请原谅，我没想起什么有用的东西，但我恐怕只能想起这些了，船长老大。”

languages.text: 「移植組織を通じて、この船のことは一心同体に感じられます。そして――いつからかは正確には分かりませんが――船の挙動が変わり始めたのを感じるのです。敏感になっている。活気づいている。そう、“活気づく”ってのが正確な表現ですね…そして、あなたの口から“エピタフ”、“事件”という言葉を聞いた時、そのことに気づいたんです。つたない報告ですみませんが。ロード・キャプテン、当面言えるのはそれだけです」
languages.original_text: "Through my implants, I feel at one with this ship. And I sense that — and I don't know when it happened exactly — it started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

traits.locale_text: 「移植組織を通じて、私はこの船のことは一心同体に感じられます。そしてーーいつからかは正確には分かりませんがーー船の挙動が変わり始めたのを感じるんです。敏感になっている。活気づいている。そう、”活気づく”っていうのが正確な表現ですね…そして、あなたが”エピタフ””事件”という言葉を出した時、そのことに気づいたんです。下手な報告ですみませんが、ロード・キャプテン、当面言えるのはそれだけです」

languages.text: «Gracias a mis implantes, siento una profunda conexión con esta nave. Y puedo percibir eso, no sé cuándo ocurrió exactamente, pero comenzó a comportarse de manera diferente. Era más receptiva, estaba más "animada". Sí, eso, "animada" es la palabra... Y cuando has dicho "Epitafio" e "incidente", se me vino a la cabeza. Disculpe mi chapucera explicación, Capi, pero es todo lo que sé al respecto».
languages.original_text: "Through my implants, I feel at one with this ship. And I sense that — and I don't know when it happened exactly — it started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias a mis implantes, siento una profunda conexión con esta nave. Y puedo percibir eso, no sé cuándo ocurrió exactamente, pero comenzó a comportarse de manera diferente. Era más receptiva, estaba más "animada". Sí, eso, "animada" es la palabra... Y cuando has dicho "Epitafio" e "incidente", se me vino a la cabeza. Disculpe mi chapucera explicación, Capi, pero es todo lo que sé al respecto».

languages.text: "İmplantlarım sayesinde bu gemiyle yekvücudum. Tam olarak ne zaman oldu bilmiyorum ama sanki geminin davranışları değişti. Daha duyarlı hâle geldi, canlı oldu. Evet, galiba en doğru kelime bu: 'Canlı'. Siz 'sinyazıt' ve 'hadise' dediğinizde nedense aklımda bunlar belirdi. Özür dilerim Lord Kaptan, yardımcı olamadım fakat bu konuda diyebileceklerim bu kadar."
languages.original_text: "Through my implants, I feel at one with this ship. And I sense that — and I don't know when it happened exactly — it started behaving differently. Became more responsive. Livelier. Yes, 'livelier' is exactly the word... And when you said 'epitaph' and 'incident' it just dawned on me. Pardon my bungled report, Lord Cap'n, but that's all I've got to say on that front."

traits.locale_text: "İmplantlarım sayesinde bu gemiyle yekvücudum. Tam olarak ne zaman oldu, bilmiyorum ama sanki geminin davranışları değişti. Daha duyarlı hâle geldi, canlı oldu. Evet, galiba en doğru kelime bu: 'Canlı'. Siz 'kitabe' ve 'hadise' dediğinizde nedense aklımda bunlar belirdi. Özür dilerim Lord Kaptan, yardımcı olamadım fakat bu konuda diyebileceklerim bu kadar."
